title: Through the Veil of Corruption
goal: The party uses Lyra's knowledge to navigate the most dangerous, corrupted lands towards the Blight's source.

beats.summary: With Lyra leading, the party embarks on a perilous journey through the heart of the Blight-infested lands, using hidden paths and ancient knowledge.
They face increasingly dangerous corrupted creatures and environmental hazards, testing their teamwork and individual skills.
Kaelen's connection to the Blight allows him to sense its movements and intentions, guiding them but also drawing its attention.
